Articles.Content:
Hi, just a quick post to ask the community and KSP Moderators/Devs if they think it would be a good idea to have a website that showcases aircraft and spacecraft, with pictures, videos and .crafts included. It's not necessarily an alternative to the forum, but it is a place for the best creations to be shared and downloaded, so that people can learn how to make successful rockets or planes by example.

I may or may not be able to come up with a good website, but I'll give it my best shot if you allow me the chance.

Thanks!

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17206-Replica-Airways-Recreating-aircraft%21

Here's my post, so you know what I've made in this forum so far! More to come.

Well there's the Spacecraft Exchange, where you posted this, it really should have gone in General Discussion though.

You could look here, or maybe start your own?

I'm also doing something like that to make it easier to find them.

more details here

Its a great idea to support video, i didnt though of it !
What would really be cool its that this "website" is accessible in game, and you could upload/download ships from inside the game

Sorry, I should have thought this through before posting, but I've had about 2hrs sleep, so I'm surprised I'm even able to type =D

I might make this a smaller website for my own creations and anyone who submits theirs to the website, but looking at some of the others, I won't be able to match their standards so I'll just do something different.

I'm not sure how it will be different, but I'll think of something!
Do you know how to program in PHP or any other weblanguage?

Nope! I'm doing it with a web creation tool called weebly. It seems good so far. I've now created a layout for the website, I just need to refine it and see what I can do about submissions (sending .crafts to be published)

I've made a Pre-Alpha for you to look at: http://replicaairways.weebly.com/index.html

Go to the Planes section, it's the only one apart from home that is set up.

NOTE: This is pre-alpha, and WILL change, this is just proof of concept and to see if the design and colour scheme works.
It look nice

What would really be cool its that this "website" is accessible in game, and you could upload/download ships from inside the game

I imagine this is planned by the devs for some point in the future, as most games have some sort of ingame menu for mods. However, since the forum works well enough, this should be low priority.
Yes, this probably won't be anything official or even close, but I do want to make a somewhat successful website, and I think I'll continue to see what we end up with. Thanks for the support!

http://replicaairways.webs.com/

http://replicaairways.weebly.com/planes.html

Which is better? I think I know the answer!

I've made a Pre-Alpha for you to look at: http://replicaairways.weebly.com/index.html

Wow, that looks great so far! Just a tip though make it so only stock craft can be uploaded or make a tag saying you need a certain mod.

Also it would look better if the back-ground was a bluish color
I like the site, nice idea, gonna be hard to move people from the forums to something like that thou
It would be hard to manually edit all your page to add all peoples submission too :s

Hey, One01x. Nice idea!

Some suggestions:

- add a version number, so people can see the game compatibility

- add rating system

- add sorting (for example: newest, top rated, popular, ...)

- license info

- author's info

Edited August 30, 2012 by StanE

Check my newest one out: http://replicaairways.webs.com/

It's got most of what you asked for, including a forum. I'll also work on a rating system too.
It looks great, but when I tried to post photos it didn't work >.>
Yeah, I'm not sure what's wrong with that... I'll work on it tonight.

Hey guys, sorry if this is against the rules, but I just wanted to let everyone know that I created a craft sharing website. If you all could let me know what you think, I'd sure appreciate it!

http://kerbalcrafts.com
